extendedInfo.description: Picture gallery for fans of great planes.U.S. Air Force photos of the military cargo plane McDonnell Douglas (now Boeing) C-17 Globemaster III, airborne and on the ground.You can set the images as wallpaper and download high resolution versions from the internet.FEATURES:* Options menu  + Help page  + Settings page    - Text color    - Background color    - Text size    - Text padding    - Reset  + Link to all iwpSoftware apps     in Android Market  + Go to bookmark  + Set bookmark  + Set current image as wallpaper  + Link to image/item/description* General features  + English and German     program language  + Contents rotate     (portrait/landscape)  + Fullscreen images     on/off by long clickDo you like this app?Please rate it!Your feedback via e-mail is welcome!NOTE:If you meet problems or feel the need of some features you consider important, please contact us via e-mail before leaving a bad review.HAVE FUN!

reviews.comment: Great! I love browsing every one you\'ve made so far! 5 stars
reviews.author: A Google User
